p: In a recent in vitro study with Vero E6 cells, CQ was effective to inhibit the SARS-CoV-2 infection [ 123, 124]. In addition 70 % of a patient group treated with HQ combined with Azithromycin had no detectable viral load after 6 days of treatment [ 126]. However, is important to show that this study is an open-label non-randomized clinical trial and the authors didnâ€™t show the inclusion criteria and the triage of patients to ensure patient safety [ 127].
